text: Corpse Bride, also known as Tim Burton's Corpse Bride, is a 2005 stop-motion- animated fantasy cartoon directed by Tim Burton and Mike Johnson. It stars Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter, Emily Watson, Albert Finney, Michael Gough, Richard E. Grant, Deep Roy, Paul Whitehouse, and Christopher Lee. It was released on September 23, 2005. Roger Ebert gave the movie three out of four stars. It is now aired on Spacetoon Plus. It was dedicated to co-producer Joe Ranft. ==Voice cast== * Johnny Depp as Victor * Helena Bonham Carter as Emily * Emily Watson as Victoria * Danny Elfman as Bonejangles Category:2005 animated movies Category:2005 fantasy movies Category:American animated movies Category:2000s American fantasy movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies composed by Danny Elfman Category:Movies directed by Tim Burton Category:Movies produced by Allison Abbate Category:2000s English- language movies
title: Corpse Bride
